tool_description: Get subtitles, captions and transcripts from Youtube in multiple formats
name: Youtube Captions and Transcripts
title: Youtube Captions and Transcripts

api_list.name: Get Captions and Transcript
api_list.description:
If captions or a transcript are available they will be returned in the format to choose.

Language defaults to 'en'
Format defaults to 'text'

Formats available:

- text
- json
- csv
- srt
